sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-col class="pl-10">
		<v-row class="text-center" id="eventExtend">
			<v-col class="pa-0">
				<event-col :header="`Cause`"  :events="causes"/>
			</v-col>
			<v-col cols="1" class="pa-0" style="max-width: 10px;"><hr class="vertical"/></v-col>
			<v-col class="pa-0">
				<event-col :header="`Turning Points`" :events="turningP"/>
			</v-col>
			<v-col cols="1" class="pa-0" style="max-width: 10px;"><hr class="vertical"/></v-col>
			<v-col class="pa-0">
				<event-col :header="`Effects`" :events="effects"/>
			</v-col>
		</v-row>
		<v-row>
			<v-btn block v-if="extendbtn" @click="extendbtn" id="buttonExtend" ><v-icon dark large>{{btntext}}</v-icon></v-btn>
			
		</v-row>
		<v-row>
			<timeline :causes="causes" :turningP="turningP" :effects="effects"/>
		</v-row>
	</v-col>
</template>

<script>
import eventCol from '@/components/Events/EventColumn.vue'
import timeline from '@/components/Timeline.vue'


export default {
  name: 'Topics',
  props: {
    causes: Array,
    turningP: Array,
    effects: Array,
  },
  components: {
    eventCol,
    timeline
  },
  data () { return {
	  	extend: false,
	  	showBtn: false,
	  	btntext: "mdi-chevron-down"
  }},
  methods:{
  	extendbtn () {
  		this.extend = !this.extend
  		if(this.extend){
			document.getElementById("eventExtend").style.maxHeight = "100%";
			this.btntext = "mdi-chevron-up";
  		}
  		else{
  			document.getElementById("eventExtend").style.maxHeight = "60%";
			this.btntext = "mdi-chevron-down";
  		}
  	}
  },
  mounted(){
  		if (this.causes.length > 5 || this.turningP.length > 5 || this.effects.length > 5){
  			this.showBtn = true
  			document.getElementById("eventExtend").style.maxHeight = "60%";
  		}
  		else{
  			document.getElementById("eventExtend").style.maxHeight = "100%";
  		}
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
	#buttonExtend{
		border: .5px dashed lightgray;
		background-color: white;
		color: lightgray;
	}
	.vertical{
		width: 1px;
	}
</style>
